alert.note: Alert for Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 03 at 2:56AM PST until January 06 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 10 inches possible. Wind gust of over 40 mph will also be possible. * WHERE...Sheep Range and Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Chain restrictions or road closures may result as heavy snowfall accumulates on high roadways above 6000 feet. Wind gusts and heavy snowfall could result in reduced visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Sheep Range; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon
